name: tree
description: Displays directory structure as a tree. Shows files and subdirectories recursively.

path.description: The directory path to display. Defaults to current directory.

max_depth.description: Maximum depth to descend into directories. Defaults to 3.

show_hidden.description: Include hidden files (starting with dot). Defaults to false.

dirs_only.description: Only show directories, not files. Defaults to false.
